elements.name: vaadin-side-nav-item
elements.description: A navigation item to be used within ``. Represents a navigation target. Not intended to be used separately. ```html Item 1 Child item 1 Child item 2 ``` ### Customization You can configure the item by using `slot` names. Slot name | Description ----------|------------- `prefix` | A slot for content before the label (e.g. an icon). `suffix` | A slot for content after the label (e.g. an icon). #### Example ```html Item Suffix ```

attributes.name: ?expanded
attributes.description: Whether to show the child items or not

elements.name: vaadin-side-nav
elements.description: `` is a Web Component for navigation menus. ```html Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Item 4 ``` ### Customization You can configure the component by using `slot` names. Slot name | Description ----------|------------- `label` | The label (text) inside the side nav. #### Example ```html Main menu Item ```

attributes.name: ?collapsible
attributes.description: Whether the side nav is collapsible. When enabled, the toggle icon is shown.

attributes.name: ?collapsed
attributes.description: Whether the side nav is collapsed. When collapsed, the items are hidden.
